alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 3:15PM AKDT until March 16 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Snow Followed by Heavy Rain for Southeast Alaska... .Snow continues to fall over the central and northern Panhandle through late Thursday. Heavy snow over the far northern Panhandle will last thought Thursday night, especially at higher elevations and locations along the border. Timing of the warming temperatures and the switch from snow over to rain for the Icy Strait Corridor is less certain and has been delayed. 2 to 5 inches of snow is still expected over the Icy Strait Corridor but possibly more with the delayed change to rain. For Yakutat moderate snow accumulations through Thursday evening before the main plume of moisture is expected to shift to west with significant snow accumulations expected through Friday morning. Still some uncertainty on where the plume of moisture tracks so this event will be monitored closely. ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow followed by heavy rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches at sea level with up to 25 inches at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel on the Klondike Highway will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates are expected Wednesday night. A transition to rain near sea level is expected late Thursday morning with heavy snow continuing at higher elevations through Thursday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
